title: Activities from Early Spring! Honey Strawberry and Garlic Harvest | American Bresse | Drying Herbs

tasks.task: Check bee hives and potentially harvest honey
subtasks: Examine the health of the bee swarm
Confirm if the hive boxes need replacement with deep or medium frames
Retrieve medium frames from the barn door

tasks.task: Harvest honey from the bee colony
subtasks: Inspect the frames to determine if the entire box can be replaced or just some frames
Teach children to pick strawberries by checking if they are ripe (red)
Verify the number of strawberries each child has picked
Take photos or videos of the strawberry-picking activity

tasks.task: Prepare garlic and onions for drying
subtasks: Evaluate the readiness of garlic heads for harvest due to the unpredictable growing season
Physically pull garlic heads from the field
Sort pulled garlic and onions to dry in the sun

tasks.task: Adjust the housing for guinea pigs
subtasks: Monitor the guinea pigs' interaction with the bunny
Move a guinea pig to a new outdoor cage for increased space and ventilation
Confirm the hen to rooster ratio in the chicken tractor
Secure the chicken enclosure by zipping it closed
Plan for the long-term breeding of American chickens
